fixed_slit.title: Name of fixed slit aperture used
fixed_slit.description: Identifies the NIRSpec fixed slit aperture to be used. The FXD_SLIT keyword value will be one of the five fixed slits for single-object spectroscopy (S200A1, S200A2, S200B1, S400A1, S1600A1).
fixed_slit.misc: Special level1b code is needed to fill this properly for some NIRSpec templates.  When unfilled in PPS, the DB-NULL is replaced with default string NONE, which is preferred by SCSB.
